price: 25. (Xus) Maalinta marka samada dillaac la furmi oo daruuro (cad ka soo baxayaan)10, lana soo dejin malaa’gta soo dejin.
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِٱلۡغَمَٰمِ وَنُزِّلَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ تَنزِيلًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wayawma tashaqqaqu al-samāu bil-ghamāmi wanuzzila al-malāikatu tanzīlan
